/ benefits in kind)?
ESRS Reference
ESRS S1 paragraphs 97 (b) and (c), and AR 101
Key terms
Annual total remuneration
Background
ESRS S1 paragraph 97 states: ‘The disclosure required by paragraph 95 shall include: …
(b) the annual total remuneration ratio of the highest paid individual to the median annual
total remuneration for all employees (excluding the highest-paid individual); and
